title: Problem when installing LOL
body: Hey guys i have problems installing LOL.It says that unspecified error occured and that i must check the logs before trying again.I dont get what logs are, first time i heard bout them.So what should I do? thanks xoxo

replies.body:
How far along in the install are you getting? If it's around 30% or less, make sure you're running the installer with admin rights and try turning off any firewalls/antivirus while it's installing as those can sometimes mess it up. 

If you're getting much further along in the install, that might be happening if your network is hitting some kind of hiccup in its connection with our servers. In that case, update your DNS and Port Forward settings by following the steps outlined in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know how that goes for you and whether it works or not!
